member.summary: The current MetaConnection of the model

member.name: P:ear.Model.ReportModel.CommonRestrictions
member.summary: List of common restrictions and values involved in the model. Common Restrictions or Values are defined in the SQL (Pre, Post, Table SQL, Where Clause, etc.) with the '{CommonRestriction_' or '{CommonValue_' keywords (e.g. {CommonRestriction_Amount} to create a common restriction named 'Amount')

member.name: P:ear.Model.ReportModel.PreLoadScript
member.summary: Optional Razor Script to modify the result table of the model just before the database load

member.name: P:ear.Model.ReportModel.LINQQueryScript
member.summary: If not empty, overwrites default query script template used to generate the LINQ query

member.name: P:ear.Model.ReportModel.LoadScript
member.summary: The Razor Script used to load the data in the table. If empty, the load script defined in the master table is used.

member.name: P:ear.Model.ReportModel.SubModelsSetRestr
member.summary: If true, restrictions and theirs values defined for the LINQ model are automatically copied to the sub-models.

member.name: P:ear.Model.ReportModel.SubModelsSetAggr
member.summary: If true, aggregates are copied to sub-models elements, otherwise the sub-models elements have no aggregate. This may impact the final performances and results (especially for Count or Average aggregates).

member.name: P:ear.Model.ReportModel.FinalScript
member.summary: Optional Razor Script to modify the model after its generation

member.name: P:ear.Model.ReportModel.ExecutionSet
member.summary: During the models generation, the models of the same Set Number are generated in parallel at the same time. The models with Set 1 are executed first at the same time, then models with Set 2, etc. This can be used if models depends on other models.

member.name: P:ear.Model.ReportModel.ShareResultTable
member.summary: If true and several models have the same SQL or Script definiton, one result table is generated and shared for those models (Optimization).

member.name: P:ear.Model.ReportModel.PrintQuery
member.summary: If true, the query is printed in the report messages (for debug purpose).

member.name: P:ear.Model.ReportModel.ShowFirstLine
member.summary: If true and the table has column values, the first line used for titles is generated in the table header

member.name: P:ear.Model.ReportModel.Alias
member.summary: Alias name used for the table defining the select

member.name: P:ear.Model.ReportModel.KeepColNames
member.summary: If true, the column names of the source a kept when building the metadata columns

member.name: P:ear.Model.ReportModel.UseRawSQL
member.summary: If true, the raw source SQL is used to generate the result table instead of using a 'select * from (Source SQL) a' statement. In this case, aggregations, restrictions and custom SQL are not applied
